title: Integrated Education on AI Knowledge and Entrepreneurial Competencies Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic AI concepts and general interest in entrepreneurship
context.additional_context: Course focused on developing and executing entrepreneurial ideas using generative AI in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners will develop the ability to apply AI theories to real-world business models using generative AI.
Learners will experience the process of establishing entrepreneurial strategies by leveraging the depth (GAU depth) and breadth (GAU breadth) of AI knowledge.
Learners will design personalized solutions that connect AI capabilities with entrepreneurial competencies based on individual creativity.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
